channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: 'A resounding home run' - the Nothing Ear (a) earbuds are some of the best we've tested and they even converted me from being an in-ear headphones skeptic
item.description: The Nothing Ear (a) are the earbuds that brought me back to the world of in-ear headphones - and they're not even pricey.

item.title: Ashley Johnson Understands the ‘Last of Us’ Season 2 Backlash
item.description: 'Passionate' is certainly a word to describe the discourse about the HBO show's second season.

item.title: I Loved My OpenClaw AI Agent—Until It Turned on Me
item.description: I used the viral AI helper to order groceries, sort emails, and negotiate deals. Then it decided to scam me.

item.title: The Very American Toyota Highlander Goes All-Electric
item.description: Will its customer base follow?

item.title: Samsung’s offering up to $900 of trade-in credit toward its new phones
item.description: Samsung’s next Unpacked event is happening on February 25th, and we anticipate the company will announce the Galaxy S26 lineup of phones. There may be some new wearables and earbuds announced, too. In addition to the showing off the new hardware, Galaxy AI software is likely to be a big part of the show, since […]

item.title: Cookeo Infinity, Polar Grit X2 et forfait 5G : 3 bons plans à ne pas rater ce mercredi
item.description: La journée du mercredi 11 février 2026 vous réserve des bons plans très attractifs sur des produits populaires du moment.

item.title: Moderna Has a Promising New Flu mRNA Vaccine. Trump’s FDA Wants Nothing to Do With It
item.description: Senior FDA official Vinay Prasad reportedly overrode his staff in deciding to reject Moderna's application for a new seasonal flu shot.

item.title: Android 17 Beta 1 est disponible : la liste des nouveautés et des Pixel compatibles
item.description: Google vient de mettre en ligne la première bêta d'Android 17. Ne cherchez pas de nouvelles icônes colorées ou des gadgets visuels, tout se passe sous le capot pour rendre le système enfin plus fluide sur tous les formats d'écran.

item.title: DOJ says Trenchant boss sold exploits to Russian broker capable of accessing ‘millions of computers and devices’
item.description: The former boss of the L3Harris-owned hacking and surveillance tools maker Trenchant faces nine years in prison for selling several exploits to a Russian broker, which counts the Russian government among its customers.

item.title: Une start-up française prépare un avion spatial à Mach 5 : ce que cache le projet Envol (interview)
item.description: Après avoir exploré Alpha Impulsion, penchons-nous maintenant sur AndroMach, une start-up française innovante dédiée au développement d'un avion suborbital conçu pour mener des expériences en micropesanteur. Nous avons eu le plaisir d'interviewer son directeur général, Hugo Verjus, qui partage...

item.title: 600 000 BMW rappelées pour risque d’incendie : la liste des modèles concernés
item.description: Rappel massif chez BMW. Un risque d’incendie au niveau du démarreur oblige le constructeur à rappeler près de 600 000 voitures. Vérifier si votre BMW fait partie de la liste.

item.title: 'I was out in Korea just a couple of weeks ago': SK Hynix partner has a cunning plan to simplify SSDs and cut memory use by 99% amidst RAM crisis
item.description: StreamFast SSD concept removes the flash translation layer and controller DRAM, using sequential device-assigned addresses to slash memory use.

item.title: Get your caffeine fix at home for less with this four-star Breville Bambino Plus at a record-low price on Amazon
item.description: The Breville Bambino Plus is a great espresso machine with simple to use features. It's on sale now at Amazon and is a delightful addition to your kitchen.

item.title: The Helldivers movie will star Jason Momoa and hits theaters on November 10, 2027
item.description: Jason Momoa will be playing the lead in the forthcoming film adaptation of the Helldivers gaming franchise, according to a report by Variety. The games don't have a story-driven protagonist, so Momoa is likely to play a currently unnamed soldier. We also have a release date for the Helldivers film. It comes out on November 10, 2027. That's a while from now, but at least it gives fans something to look forward to. The movie is being directed by Justin Lin, who is best known for helming several entries in the Fast & Furious franchise. However, he also directed Star Trek Beyond, proving he can do...

item.title: Genesis G80 : cette marque arrive en France avec une berline électrique de luxe
item.description: Avec cette voiture électrique de plus de 5 mètres, la firme coréenne Genesis s'attaque frontalement aux ténors allemands du segment premium. Entre ambitions affichées et réalité du marché, la marque du groupe Hyundai peut-elle vraiment faire trembler les références établies ?

item.title: Genesis arrive enfin en France : tout savoir sur cette marque coréenne et ses 3 voitures électriques
item.description: Après plusieurs marchés européens, Genesis arrive officiellement en France. La marque premium de Hyundai débarque avec trois voitures électriques et une stratégie de déploiement assez prudente.

item.title: Plus rapide qu’une Audi ou une BMW : le Genesis GV60 arrive en France avec sa recharge ultra rapide
item.description: Genesis arrive en France avec trois voitures électriques. Parmi elles, le GV60, un SUV électrique concurrent des Audi Q4 e-tron et BMW iX1 mais qui s'en démarque par un style original, une recharge ultra-rapide et une prometteuse version sportive.

item.title: Genesis lance le Electrified GV70 en France : sûrement le SUV électrique le plus sous-coté du moment
item.description: 490 chevaux, une architecture 800 volts et un écran OLED de 27 pouces. Non, ce n'est pas la fiche technique d'une voiture chinoise, mais celle du Genesis Electrified GV70. L'outsider coréen débarque sur le marché français avec une ambition simple : nous faire oublier les constructeurs allemands, chinois et Tesla évidemment.

item.title: 30 sophisticated silver home office upgrades to elevate your workspace
item.description: For a polished modern desk set-up.

item.title: Thomas Edison Tried to Build an EV Battery in 1901. Scientists Just Made It Work
item.description: The battery won't power cars as the famous inventor intended, but it's still got a lot of potential.

item.title: Why the economics of orbital AI are so brutal
item.description: A 1 Gw orbital data center would cost roughly $42.4B—almost three times its ground-bound equivalent.

item.title: Jeffrey Epstein Advised an Elon Musk Associate on Taking Tesla Private
item.description: The financier recommended adding Margaret Thatcher to Tesla’s board even though she had been dead for five years.

item.title: iOS 26.3 est disponible, avec des fonctions exclusives pour l’Europe
item.description: iOS 26.3 est finalement disponible dans sa version finale, après quelques semaines de bêtas. Cette mise à jour ne restera pas dans les annales au vu du volume de nouveautés, il y en a néanmoins quelques unes intéressantes en particulier pour les utilisateurs européens.

item.title: Microsoft fixes Notepad flaw that could trick users into clicking malicious Markdown links
item.description: Microsoft has fixed a serious security vulnerability affecting Markdown files in Notepad. In the company's Tuesday patch notes, Microsoft says a bad actor could carry out a remote code execution attack by tricking users "into clicking a malicious link inside a Markdown file opened in Notepad," as reported earlier by The Register. Clicking the link […]...

item.title: Our Favorite Upgraded Power Bank Is $30 Off
item.description: This supercharged Anker pack can keep all your devices topped up.

item.title: Life is Strange : Reunion sur PS5 en précommande à 39,99 € : une conclusion qui s’annonce épique où vos choix ont des conséquences
item.description: Life is Strange est une franchise vidéoludique à forte dimension narrative qui a connu plusieurs épisodes. Reunion est le volet final disponible le 26 mars 2026 pour 39,99 euros au lieu de 49,99 euros sur Amazon et Auchan.

item.title: Here are the 40 best Presidents Day deals you can already shop
item.description: Deals have been admittedly pretty dry since the holidays, but now that February is in full swing, we’re starting to see strong discounts return across a range of categories. In fact, thanks to Valentine’s Day, the Super Bowl, and — as of this week — Presidents Day, retailers are once again offering a slew of […]

item.title: Jason Momoa Will Be a Starship Trooper in Sony’s ‘Helldivers’ Movie
item.description: The latest Sony and PlayStation collaboration will be directed by Justin Lin and hit theaters November 10, 2027.

item.title: Why ‘deleted’ doesn’t mean gone: How police recovered Nancy Guthrie’s doorbell footage
item.description: FBI Director Kash Patel said yesterday that investigators recovered footage from Savannah Guthrie's mother's doorbell camera using "residual data located in backend systems." This claim has many home security camera users asking an uncomfortable question: Is your data really gone when you hit delete? When Nancy Guthrie went missing, officials said she had a doorbell […]...

item.title: Threads’ new ‘Dear Algo’ feature lets you tell the algorithm what you want to see
item.description: Threads now lets users in the US adjust what is recommended in their feed by writing "Dear Algo" in a post and explaining what they're looking for. The feature is part of a bigger push across Meta's platforms to give users more control over the types of posts that are recommended to them. Dear Algo […]

item.title: Threads’ new ‘Dear Algo’ AI feature lets you personalize your feed
item.description: The platform's new feature lets users tell Threads what they temporarily want to see more or less of in their feed.

item.title: Google releases the first beta of Android 17, adopts a continuous developer release plan
item.description: Google is changing how developers get access to new APIs and features of the latest version.

item.title: Meta turned Threads algorithm complaints into an official feature
item.description: Threads users have been complaining about its recommendation algorithm pretty much since the beginning of the platform. At some point, this turned into a meme, with users writing posts jokingly addressed to the algorithm in which they requested to see more posts about the topics they're actually interested in.Now, Meta is turning those "Dear algorithm" posts into an official feature that it says will allow Threads users to tune their recommendations in real time. With the change, users can write a post that begins with "dear algo" to adjust their preferences. For example, you could write "dear...

item.title: On a cru qu’elle était en panne : comment la nouvelle souris de Logitech supprime toute sensation de clic
item.description: Il est possible de désactiver tout retour haptique (et donc tactile) sur la Logitech G Pro X2 Superstrike. Après l’avoir testée pendant une petite heure, l'expérience est pour le moi détourante.

item.title: OpenAI hails 1 million Codex downloads, but warns limits may be coming - but ChatGPT Deep Research users get a whole load of upgrades to boost their work
item.description: OpenAI says Codex macOS app has been downloaded more than 1 million times in just over a week.

item.title: How AI changes the math for startups, according to a Microsoft VP
item.description: Amanda Silver is a corporate vice president at Microsoft’s CoreAI division, where she works on tools for deploying apps and agentic systems within enterprises.

item.title: The AirTag 2 is way more findable — and louder — than the original, and this is a truly worthy upgrade
item.description: I test-drove the new AirTag (2026) — and it lives up to all of Apple's promises

item.title: Ableton Live is adding audio streaming for real-time musical collaboration
item.description: Ableton is rolling out the Live 12.4 Beta with a number of new features, but the headliner is Link Audio, which enables real-time collaboration between devices on a local network. Having to be on the same network is a serious limitation and, as the name implies, Link Audio only supports streaming audio. That means your […]

item.title: Amazon's Presidents' Day sale is surprisingly filled with award-winning tech gadgets — here's everything I'd buy as a deals expert
item.description: Amazon just launched its Presidents' Day sale, and some of its best deals are on award-winning tech gadgets, including AirPods, TVs, smart home devices, and more.

item.title: UpScrolled’s social network is struggling to moderate hate speech after fast growth
item.description: UpScrolled, a social network that surged in the wake of the U.S. TikTok deal, has seen an uptick in harmful content, including usernames and hashtags that contain racial slurs.

item.title: Sleep Earbuds Are Getting Scarily Advanced
item.description: Scarily in a good way, I hope.

item.title: One Mexican Cartel ‘Drone’ Near El Paso Airspace Was Actually Party Balloon: Report
item.description: FAA initially ordered the closure of airspace over El Paso for 10 days before backtracking.

item.title: The Sony A7 V is still topping best-selling camera lists – here are 9 perfect-match lenses I recommend for it
item.description: I love shooting with the best-selling Sony A7 V – and if you've just bought one, then these are the 9 Sony and third-party lenses I’d recommend to go with it

item.title: Save 88%: Combine Hostinger's current discount with our exclusive code for the best-on-the-market deal
item.description: If you want to start your own business in 2026, this exclusive Hostinger discount is one to take advantage of.

item.title: I can't find any RAM kits without overspending during this memory crisis – but this Adata 32GB option might do the trick
item.description: The RAM crisis has left very few inexpensive options available on the market, but Adata's XPG 32GB option fits the bill.

item.title: My job offered me a voluntary severance. Here’s what my decision taught me
item.description: Secure the generous severance bag or jettison up the corporate ladder? That was the question. If your employer offered you a lump sum to permanently ditch the job that stresses you out like no other, would you take the money and run—or worry about what it might cost you later? I never thought I’d actually encounter this career conundrum. Looking back, I’m surprised by the choice I made....

item.title: How to listen to 'The Archers' for free from anywhere in the world
item.description: 'The Archers' is still one of the easiest BBC dramas to keep up with, as long as you know where to look.

item.title: Keep forgetting your insurance renewals? This free app will organise them for you – and could save you money in the process
item.description: A new free app from Go.Compare is promising to fix your insurance headaches by organising your renewals in one handy place.

item.title: Instagram and X have an impossible deepfake detection deadline
item.description: The best methods we currently have for detecting and labelling deepfakes online are about to get a stress test. India announced mandates on Tuesday that require social media platforms to remove illegal AI-generated materials much faster, and ensure that all synthetic content is clearly labeled. Tech companies have said for years that they wanted to […]...

item.title: On a vu les voitures électriques de Dreame : 500 km/h et 2 000 chevaux pour essayer de battre Tesla, BYD et Xiaomi
item.description: Un constructeur chinois d'aspirateurs robot se lance dans les voitures électriques. Et pas n'importe lesquelles, puis qu'elles sont capables, sur le papier, d'atteindre 500 km/h. On a pu les approcher. Voici ce qu'on en pense.
